text: Alexandra Coletti (born 8 August 1983 in La Colle, Monaco) is an alpine skier. She went to the 2006 Winter Olympics and the 2010 Winter Olympics for Monaco. She was Monaco's flagbearer at the Opening Ceremony of the 2010 Winter Olymics. She also won the silver medal at the 2005 European Cup for downhill skiing. Her brother, Stefano Coletti, is a racing driver in the IndyCar Series. == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Monaco Category:Skiers
title: Alexandra Coletti
